node.title: Animating architectural renders in after effects

node.text: Sound on! I love making these kind of images! If you are interested in getting the photoshop file and seeing the 1 hour video you can access my patreon page! If not then youtube is fine :)
Sound on! It is important to learn every program and combine workflows. Don´t be that person that only uses "lumion" or "photoshop". Combine them!

node.text:
As architecture students we barely have time to do anything. Reading a book does count as relaxing time so you can read one of these recommended books about the theory of architecture while you take a break. 
👇🏼Have you read any of these?
💛 Which one do you recommend? 📚

SHOWITBETTER'.

node.text:
Using different architectural representation styles doesn’t come down to what looks prettier but to what communicates and finally sells an idea. And sometimes when we have creative blockages we tend to give up and just use the same representation style over and over again. 
👉🏼 So check out these different architectural representation styles that you can use in your projects. 
👇🏼 Which one do you normally use?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Show It Better on August 09, 2021. May be an image of text.

Sometimes we just have to do some more research and start experimenting with different techniques to get our point across in our projects. These are some architectural representation styles you can start using to alternate. Find tutorials on some of these styles in our blog. SHOWITBETTER'.

In order to be found you have to be findable." Taken from the book by Austin Kleon, Show Your Work! SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on August 05, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION FIND A SCENIUS "Give what you have. To someone, it may be better than you dare think." Henry Wadsworth Longfellow People who we think of as lone geniuses were actually part of 'a whole scene of people who were supporting each other, looking at each other's work, copying from each other, stealing ideas, and contributing ideas. SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on August 05, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION The Internet is basically a bunch of sceniuses connected together, divorced from physical geography. Scenius doesn't take away from the achievements of those great individuals; it just acknowledges that good work isn't created in a vacuum, and that creativity is always, in some sense, a collaboration, the result of a mind connected to other minds. SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on August 05, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION BE AN AMATEUR "That's all any of us are: amateurs. We don't live long enough be anything else." Charlie Chaplin Amateurs are not afraid to make mistakes or look ridiculous in public. They'r in love, so they don't hesitate to do work that others think of as silly or just plain stupid. SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on August 05, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION YOU CAN'T FIND YOUR VOICE IF YOU DON'T USE IT If your work isn't online, it doesn't exist. We all have the opportunity to use our voices, to have our say, but so many of us are wasting it. If you want people to know about what you do and the things you care about, you have to share. SHOWITBETTER TER SHOWIT'.

Follow their example. SHOWITBETTER'.

node.text:
Giorgio Grassi, a modern Italian architect, who is part of the Italian rationalist school. 
Grassi argued that “architecture had to look within itself to an autonomous methodology, separate from political, economic, social and technological events.” 
Do you like his drawings? 👇🏼

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Show It Better on August 03, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION Drawing Spotlight- Giorgio-Grassi. SHOWITBETTER RicostruzioneelCasl Di Ricostruzione Del Castello Nimega 1997'.

May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHÍTECTURE ECTURE REPRESENTATION Unitá Residenziale Sul Fiume In Borgo Ticino A Pavia 1972 Giorgio Grassi, one of Italy's most important modern architects, and part of the so-called Italian rationalist school. His extremely formal work is predicated on absolute simplicity, clarity, and honesty without ingratiation, rhetoric, or spectacular shape-making it refers to historical archetypes form and space and has a strong concern with the making of urban space. SHOWITBETTER'.

Any type of competition helps you get better with time. So why not take advantage of the competitions going on this upcoming month? 

Are you participating in any competitions right now?👇🏼

node.text:
Sometimes is good to space out a little bit even if is reading a really good book. These are some recommendations if you want to procrastinate a little bit from architecture without leaving it aside. How important is graphic design in your life?

Have you read any of these books?👇🏼📚

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Show It Better on July 28, 2021. May be an image of book and text that says 'ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION 2021 Graphic Design Books architects Should read. More info in our blog. SHOWITBETTER Left at Least One Sentence Standing Whole" Cristiana Couceiro'.

Photo by Show It Better on July 28, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION It is not only about sections, floor plans, or sketches. It is also about the correct typography, how to combine color palettes, composition, the use of spaces, etc. This is why architects should also focus on graphic design. These are some graphic design book recommendations for all architects that want to go beyond what they are thought in school. SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on July 28, 2021. May be an image of book and text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION Making and Breaking the Grid, 2017 Timothy Samara Second SecondEdition andExpanded Making ယမာ adBreak ing Samara Grids are the most basic and essential forms in graphic design-and -and they can be the most rigid. This book shows you how to understand the rules of the grid to use them effectively, and then how to break them, resulting in phenomenal cohesive layouts. Grid Ghic GaLytWh Design Layout Workshop SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on July 28, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION The Designer's Dictionary of Color, 2017 Sean Adams The Designer's Dictionary of Color By ÛeaAdms Foreword Sean Helfand Chapters detail each color's creative history and cultural associations, with examples of color use that extend from the artistic to the utilitarian. It documents each hue with charts showing color range and palette variations SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on July 28, 2021. Essays range across design history, practice, and process; urban design and architecture; design hoaxes; pop culture; Hydrox cookies, Peggy Noonan, baseball, DILILUL SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on July 28, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION Design as Art, 1966 Bruno Munari Design as Art Bruno Munari Munari insisted that design be beautiful, functional and accessible, and this enlightening and highly entertaining book sets out his ideas about visual, graphic and industrial design and the role it plays in the objects we use everyday @情翻家 SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on July 28, 2021. Photo by Show It Better on July 28, 2021. node.text:
Do you have great architectural ideas but don’t know exactly how to portray them? 
Do you still have doubts about presentation boards? 
🖍 This is the right course for you then! 
🧑🏻‍💻 Enroll and start mastering your presentation boards, from understanding, to composition, typography, workflow, etc. 

Did you enroll in our course already? 👇🏼💛

May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION Mimesis. supm EASPECTIVE Whether it is through images or text, we need to tell the world what we think space should look like. And we all now that a Presentation Board is one of the most effective ways of communicating ideas. SHOWITBETTER'.

Photo by Show It Better on July 26, 2021. May be an image of text that says '2021 ARCHITECTURE REPRESENTATION In this course you will understand and learn how to create a presentation board that can communicate effectively the message of the architecture that is being portrayed. τΕχ SHOWITBETTER'.
Photo by Show It Better on July 26, 2021. May be a cartoon of text.
